category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Members of this group will be excluded from the SeoEx plugin and can post without moderation even without the required post count.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Define how many postings a user must have written to be able to post links without moderation.

category.name: wbb.threadAdd
category.item: Because you added at least one link to your message, your post needs to be checked and approved by a moderator before it is made visible to members.

category.name: wbb.postAdd
category.item: Because you added at least one link to your message, your post needs to be checked and approved by a moderator before it is made visible to members.
